results.body: Five months after introducing himself to the world, Jeremy Lin is still inspiring various forms of passion and hysteria. This is not Linsanity as we knew it in February, when the word was synonymous with joy and wonder, but some horrific mutation of the phenomenon. In this version, Linsanity is a Knicks franchise willfully extinguishing the joy.
